function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of being exposed to the virus at work","Impact":"Potential transmission of COVID-19 within the construction workforce","Mitigation":"Implementing strict health and safety protocols, providing personal protective equipment (PPE), and promoting vaccination among workers","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, health monitoring technology, and air filtration systems","People":"Construction workforce","Owner":"Employers and project managers"},{"Description":"Uncertainty about the future of the workforce","Impact":"Anxiety and stress among construction workers, leading to decreased productivity and mental health issues","Mitigation":"Providing clear communication about the future of projects, offering support services for mental health, and creating flexible work arrangements","Technologies":"Online project management tools, mental health support apps, and virtual communication platforms","People":"Construction workforce","Owner":"Employers and project managers"},{"Description":"Lack of access to tools and equipment needed to perform the job","Impact":"Disruption of work and potential delays in project timelines","Mitigation":"Ensuring availability of necessary tools and equipment, implementing equipment sanitation protocols, and providing remote work options","Technologies":"Digital project management systems, remote access technology, and equipment tracking solutions","People":"Construction workforce","Owner":"Employers and project managers"}]}
